attributes-to-ignore-regex.displayName: Attributes to Ignore by Regular Expression

attributes-to-log-regex.name: attributes-to-log-regex
attributes-to-log-regex.displayName: Attributes to Log by Regular Expression

properties.distinctQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
  numero_acte_deces AS id_deces,
  code_lieu_deces AS code_lieu_deces,
  CAST(SUBSTRING(date_deces, 1, 4) AS INTEGER) AS annee_deces,
  CAST(SUBSTRING(date_deces, 6, 2) AS INTEGER) AS mois_deces,
  date_naissance AS date_naissance
FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE
  numero_acte_deces IS NOT NULL
  AND code_lieu_deces IS NOT NULL
  AND date_deces IS NOT NULL
  AND date_naissance IS NOT NULL

properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO TABLE FAIT_DECES (id_deces, date_naissance, id_lieu, id_temps, annee_deces)
VALUES ('${numero_acte_deces}', '${date_naissance}', '${code_lieu_deces}', concat('${annee_deces}', '${mois_deces}'), '${annee_deces}');

properties.validation-details-attribute-name:
/Numero_acte_deces IS NOT NULL
  AND /Age IS NOT NULL
  AND /Mois_deces IS NOT NULL AND /Code_lieu_deces IS NOT NULL
  AND /Anne_deces IS NOT NULL;
